networks.Switch.Switch¶

class networks.Switch.Switch(name, bus_id, type, closed, base_freq, max_ka)¶

Bases: Element

Represents a switch element in a power system network.

Parameters:

  • bus_id (int) – The ID of the bus where the switch is connected.

  • name (str) – The name of the switch.

  • type (str) – The type of the switch.

  • closed (bool) – Whether the switch is closed or not.

  • base_freq (float) – The base frequency of the switch.

  • max_ka (float) – Maximum kiloampere rating of the switch.

__init__(name, bus_id, type, closed, base_freq, max_ka)¶

Initializes a Switch object.

Parameters:

  • bus_id (int) – The ID of the bus where the switch is connected.

  • name (str) – The name of the switch.

  • type (str) – The type of the switch.

  • closed (bool) – Whether the switch is closed or not.

  • base_freq (float) – The base frequency of the switch.

  • max_ka (float) – Maximum kiloampere rating of the switch.
